trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The bat can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage.
